title: Mysql_Mcp_Server
description: A secure MCP server interfacing with MySQL databases, allowing controlled SQL operations for AI-driven database exploration.
creator: designcomputer

MYSQL_HOST.description: The hostname or IP address of the MySQL server.

MYSQL_USER.description: The username to connect to the MySQL database.

MYSQL_PASSWORD.description: The password for the specified MySQL user.

MYSQL_DATABASE.description: The name of the MySQL database to connect to.
